ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: you will entice no one to them
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Can mislead anyone away from Him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: shall not be able to tempt anyone away from Allah
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: You cannot make anyone rebel against Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Not against Him can you cause (any) to fall into trial,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: you shall not tempt any against Him
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: can lure away from God any
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Can tempt anyone to rebel against Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Can lead (any) into temptation concerning Allah,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Cannot lead astray [turn away from Him (Allah) anyone of the believers],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: you shall tempt none against Him
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: You cannot tempt [anyone] away from Him
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:162] — you cannot tempt, anyone, thereto, that is, to [incline to] your [worshipped] idols (‘alayhi, ‘thereto’, is semantically connected to His saying [bi-fātinīna], ‘you cannot tempt’),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Ye cannot excite (anyone) against Him) you cannot lead anyone astray from His worship
